name: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
description:
You are the Mad Mage and you got lost in a dangerous dungeon. 

Some skeletons are appearing.  They are horrible and want to kill you.

But not today. KILL THEM ALL!

Controls:

-"AWSD" to move

-"Mouse" to rotate and aim

-"Left Mouse Button" to energy spell (more damage in a smaller area)

-"Right Mouse Button" to fireball spell (less damage in a bigger area)

-"Space" to teleport
